meanings: do volunteer[voluntary] work at an orphanage

vlive.korean: 사모님이 고아원에 데려다주라고 한 날 제가 아이 바꿔치기했습니다. When you told me to take the child to the orphanage, I secretly switched out the baby. 듣기 View video V WEB DRAMA : [첫 키스만 일곱 번째] 옥택연 엔딩
vlive.english: When you told me to take the child to the orphanage, I secretly switched out the baby.

examples.korean: an orphan asylum 발음듣기 고아원. Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary
The orphanage where he grew up was built as a result of private philanthropy. 발음듣기 그가 자랐던 고아원은 개인의 자선활동으로 지어졌었다. 절대어휘 5100
examples.english: The orphanage where he grew up was built as a result of private philanthropy. 발음

examples.korean: This orphanage has many benefactors. 발음듣기 이 고아원은 많은 후원자들이 있다. 절대어휘 5100
examples.english: This orphanage has many benefactors. 발음

examples.korean: Children are sent to an orphanage when they have no one to take care of them. 발음듣기 아이들은 돌봐줄 사람이 아무도 없을 때 고아원에 보내진다. 절대어휘 5100
examples.english: Children are sent to an orphanage when they have no one to take care of them. 발음

examples.korean: Many children from the orphanage suffered from institutional syndrome. 발음듣기 고아원에 있던 많은 아이들이 수용화 증후군을 겪었다. 국제영어대학원대학교 신어사전
examples.english: Many children from the orphanage suffered from institutional syndrome. 발음
